diff_hunk:
@@ -970,13 +964,34 @@ workflows:
   version: 2
   build:
     jobs:
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py2_7_9_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py2_7_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py3_5_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py3_6_gcc4_8_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py3_6_gcc5_4_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py3_6_gcc7_build_test
-      - pytorch_linux_trusty_pynightly_build_test
+      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py2_7_9_build
+      - pytorch_linux_trusty_py2_7_9_test:
+          requires:
+            - pytorch_linux_trusty_py2_7_9_build
body: We have to split up build and test even for CPU jobs, because the test timeout error usually happens on CPU, and we only want to rerun the test job.
body_html: We have to split up build and test even for CPU jobs, because the test timeout error usually happens on CPU, and we only want to rerun the test job.
body_text: We have to split up build and test even for CPU jobs, because the test timeout error usually happens on CPU, and we only want to rerun the test job.
